title: Output Shaft - Inspection

body.body: Examine all gears, bearings, bushes and thrust washers for damage, distortion, chipped teeth and wear beyond the service limits. Replace all suspect components and always use a new circlip to assemble the shaft.

search: Examine all gears, bearings, bushes and thrust washers for damage, distortion, chipped teeth and wear beyond the service limits. Replace all suspect components and always use a new circlip to assemble the shaft.
